products.name: Mighty Caps
products.shortDescription: Perfect microdose capsules for daily focus and clarity.
products.longDescription: Our Mighty Caps combine premium Golden Teacher mushrooms with organic lion's mane and niacin for optimal cognitive enhancement. Each capsule contains a precisely measured microdose, making them ideal for beginners and experienced explorers alike.

products.name: Hercules
products.shortDescription: High-dose capsules for transformative macro and hero journeys.
products.longDescription: Hercules capsules deliver a powerful dose for those seeking deep introspection and spiritual exploration. Made with premium Golden Teacher mushrooms, these capsules are ideal for experienced psychonauts ready for profound experiences.

products.name: Mighty Caps
products.shortDescription: Potent Penis Envy microdoses for those seeking intensity.
products.longDescription: These Mighty Caps feature the legendary Penis Envy strain, known for its exceptional potency. Ideal for experienced microdosers who want a more intense cognitive boost and creative enhancement.

products.name: Psilly Gummies
products.shortDescription: Delicious fruit-flavored gummies with Amazonian mushrooms.
products.longDescription: Our gummies combine the energizing effects of Amazonian mushrooms with natural fruit flavors. Each gummy is precisely dosed for consistent, enjoyable experiences. Perfect for social settings or outdoor adventures.

products.name: Mystic Tea Blend
products.shortDescription: A ceremonial tea blend with rare Enigma mushrooms.
products.longDescription: This carefully crafted tea blend features the mysterious Enigma strain alongside organic herbs and botanicals. Brew a cup for a gentle, introspective journey with a smooth onset and comfortable experience.

products.name: Golden Honey
products.shortDescription: Raw honey infused with potent Cambodian mushrooms.
products.longDescription: Our golden honey is infused with Cambodian mushrooms and raw, organic honey. Perfect for adding to tea, spreading on toast, or enjoying by the spoonful. A delicious way to experience the benefits of psilocybin.
